alert.note: Alert for Lee; St. Francis (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 11 at 10:27PM CDT until April 11 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Lee County in eastern Arkansas... Central St. Francis County in eastern Arkansas... * Until 1115 PM CDT. * At 1027 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Wheatley, or near Brinkley, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Forrest City, Madison, Palestine, Caldwell, Wheatley, Widener, Haynes, New Salem, Brickeys, New Home, Cody, Kokomo, Slonikers Mill, Westor, New Castle, Soudan, Goodwin, Round Pond, Heustess and Ball Point. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
